channel.title: Object GFX
channel.description:
So, I'm adding the full completionist cape dialogue to my 718 RSPS, I've got almost everything that I need. My problem is that I can't add any graphics/gfx to the Completionist Cape stand.
I've tried, [code]player.getPackets().sendGraphics(new Graphics(ID_HERE), object);[/code] but it doesn't work.
I'm using this dialogue as the base, http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/snippets/456289-matrix-completionist-cape-dialogue.html
My question is: Do someone know how I can add graphics to objects (in dialogues)? I hope someone can help me. Thanks.

So, I’m adding the full completionist cape dialogue to my 718 RSPS, I’ve got almost everything that I need.
